name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion Ultimate Edition

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG Windows installer

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Sins of a Solar Empire - Rebellion/Sins of a Solar Empire Rebellion.exe

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG Windows installer
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Sins of a Solar Empire - Rebellion/Sins of a Solar Empire
    Rebellion.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing game...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
